    public class TopicNotificationNoteProcessor
extends NotificationNoteProcessor
    Processor which handles topic mention flags.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • isSendNotifications

        protected boolean isSendNotifications(Note note,
                                      NoteStoringTO orginalNoteStoringTO,
                                      Map<String,String> properties,
                                      NoteNotificationDetails resendDetails)
        Description copied from class: NotificationNoteProcessor
        Whether this notification processor wants to send notifications. This method is called by NotificationNoteProcessor.process(Note, NoteStoringTO, Map) in the synchronous processing phase. Implementations of this check should be fast.
        Specified by:
        isSendNotifications in class NotificationNoteProcessor
        Parameters:
        note - the note which was created or updated
        orginalNoteStoringTO - the TO which was used to create or update the note
        properties - Properties that can be used to pass some data to the asynchronous post-processing. They will be available in the NoteStoringPostProcessorContext.
        resendDetails - if the note was updated and the author does not which to resend notifications this object will contain details about notifications send for the note before the update. Will be null in all other cases.
        Returns:
        true if this processor wants to send notifications, false otherwise

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Returns:
        a string which uniquely identifies this processor. The string should not contain spaces.

      • getOrder

        public int getOrder()
        Returns:
        0

      • getUsersToNotify

        protected Collection<User> getUsersToNotify(Note note,
                                            NoteStoringPostProcessorContext context,
                                            Set<Long> userIdsToSkip)
        Retrieves the users to be notified. Implementors need not to be concerned about filtering the user not to notify because this is done in the NotificationNoteProcessor.processAsynchronously(Long, NoteStoringPostProcessorContext) method. Whether users should be ignored if they do not have read access to the blog mainly depends on the type of the notification processor and is thus implementation specific.
        Specified by:
        getUsersToNotify in class NotificationNoteProcessor
        Parameters:
        note - the note to notify about
        context - the context
        userIdsToSkip - the IDs of the users that should not be notified
        Returns:
        the users to notify, can be null

      • setAuthorFetchSize

        public void setAuthorFetchSize(int fetchSize)
